rows.label: qst201001_msg0001
rows.name:
It doesn't seem as if the false
rumors have caught on yet.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0002
rows.name:
The longer we take, the more
casualties there will be.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0003
rows.name:
We don't have the luxury
of time. Please hurry.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0004
rows.name:
We've noticed the false rumors
have started to spread.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0005
rows.name:
The Core Crystal hunters
are sure to bite now!

rows.label: qst201001_msg0006
rows.name:
We've already got a capture squad
at the ready. All we need now is
the Merc Group's support.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0007
rows.name:
We're grateful to have the
backing of the Merc Group.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0008
rows.name:
Our squad is ready to
mobilize at any moment.

rows.label: qst201001_msg0009
rows.name:
There's not much time, so I'd
like to ask you to move to
your designated positions.
